thread.title: Red Panda Visits Beardsley Zoo
thread.title_full: Red Panda Visits Beardsley Zoo - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Red Panda Visits Beardsley Zoo
text:
Caption Red Panda Visit STEPHEN DUNN / Hartford Courant Rochan, a 16-month old Red Panda has moved to the Beardsley Zoo temporarily while his home at Boston's Franklin Park Zoo is renovated.
Rochan, a 16-month old Red Panda has moved to the Beardsley Zoo temporarily while his home at Boston's Franklin Park Zoo is renovated.
(STEPHEN DUNN / Hartford Courant) Red Panda Visit STEPHEN DUNN / Hartford Courant Rainforest Zoo Keeper Martyna Zmijewski fed Rochan bamboo and "red panda biscuits" Friday during feeding time inside her new home at the Rainforest building.
Rainforest Zoo Keeper Martyna Zmijewski fed Rochan bamboo and "red panda biscuits" Friday during feeding time inside her new home at the Rainforest building.
